text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Elden Ring. The build quality of the ASUS TUF Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 120 Hz Full HD IPS-Type, AMD Ryzen 7 R7-3750H, GeForce GTX 1650, 8 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, Gigabit Wi-Fi 5, Windows 10 Home, FX505DT-EB73 is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1650 in the ASUS TUF Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 120 Hz Full HD IPS-Type, AMD Ryzen 7 R7-3750H, GeForce GTX 1650, 8 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, Gigabit Wi-Fi 5, Windows 10 Home, FX505DT-EB73 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1650 in the ASUS TUF Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 120 Hz Full HD IPS-Type, AMD Ryzen 7 R7-3750H, GeForce GTX 1650, 8 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, Gigabit Wi-Fi 5, Windows 10 Home, FX505DT-EB73 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1650. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS TUF Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 120 Hz Full HD IPS-Type, AMD Ryzen 7 R7-3750H, GeForce GTX 1650, 8 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, Gigabit Wi-Fi 5, Windows 10 Home, FX505DT-EB73!

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Fortnite, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the ASUS TUF Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 120 Hz Full HD IPS-Type, AMD Ryzen 7 R7-3750H, GeForce GTX 1650, 8 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, Gigabit Wi-Fi 5, Windows 10 Home, FX505DT-EB73. The speakers is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.
